main event: On 8 Oct 60, a round, bright object emitting a reddish-orange glow was observed over Sweetwater, South Carolina.
interesting points: The object was seen hovering and moving erratically at high speed without any sound,The sighting lasted for about 10 to 15 minutes and also involved family members who verified the sighting,The object changed direction abruptly and displayed no visible means of propulsion,There was no radar detection during the observation,The weather conditions were clear and there were no similar sightings reported on that date.
sighted object: round, bright object emitting a reddish-orange glow
witness description: The witnesses were family members who were outside their residence at the time of the sighting.
